turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was wanting to order two large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both of them with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, they charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me order that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $48, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you said pick-up, is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
